revised_title: Richard Dunthorne's Analysis of Historical Comet Observations
tldr: Richard Dunthorne examines historical comet observations and manuscripts, discussing the possible identity of a comet from 1264 with one observed in 1556 and 1680. He analyzes the place and motion of the comets, considering their orbits and periods, and speculates on the return of the comet in the year 1848.
